title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 78.6 - Foreign and alien insurers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 78.6 - Foreign and alien insurers

State Regulations

The minimum ownership requirements imposed on domestic insurers by sections
1602
and
1702
of the Insurance Law shall not be applicable to foreign or alien insurers for the purpose of determining whether an investment in a subsidiary should be disallowed under section
1413 (a)
of the Insurance Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
78.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
